attributes.action: The prime minister to resign effective immediately
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has shown once again that both himself and his cabinet are unwilling to act upon the cost of living crisis. Immediate action is need to mitigate this crisis. Already the poorest are struggling to cope and every week inflation grows to a new height. People simply can't wait for September for action to be taken. If this prime minister is unwilling to govern then a new leader must take his place immediately.
attributes.background: To immediately replace the prime minister with either a new caretaker prime minister or conclude the leadership election before the September deadline

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes petitions that make requests in relation to the resignation or appointment of Government ministers.
